thread.title: Brandon
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Brandon

author: Brandon
title: Brandon
text: Eric is a fantastic salesman...did not feel pressured at all. He was there when we had questions and was able to direct is to where we needed to go. I have never had a better experience buying anything. Eric has made an impression on us and we will most certainly refer our friends.
